title: Game dc
body:
Mid game my blitz and Olaf dc at same split second. Im thinking wtf...
3 minutes later I dc, and it's not my internet. I tried rejoining multiple times and It wouldnt load up. The client was working it just wouldnt load the game. I Talked to a friend who was in champ select, his game wouldn't load either.

I was like 8/3/5 graves carrying my feeding team, I think its unfair if i suffer a loss of LP for this? I MAY have been able to carry

replies.body: We've posted a retrospective on the issues this morning and yesterday with information about what happened [here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XHGFrU9j-follow-up-on-connection-issues-5032015).
We can't enter a game. We've been "preparing ourselves, the battle is about to begin" for 10 minutes now
